name: Anidol Colors
storyline: You play a manager of an idol training school known as the Sirius Academy, where you are tasked with taking care of young idols who are actually animals. The Anidol in the game’s title is a portmanteau of the words animal and idol, in case you have not noticed. After training your idols and giving them experience via rehearsals, you will be able to send them off on their way to they can go for auditions to compete against themselves.
summary: Featuring two virtual idol groups, 7 Colors and Clarity, Anidol Colors' is Voltage's latest otome game for animal lovers and handsome guy admirers.
